subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Franks stuff/Temp for predictions/43-June16thThere'llBeNobodyLeft---.mp3 
  Uploaded by : purplespacefriend <fsumption@...> 
  Description : I got this in March, 2006 "June 16th there'll be no one left to use your boxes". I have these on my site, but there's a wierd porblem with tripod, and ActiveX controls that tends to locks up poeple's computers when they try to get to this stuff.  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Franks%20stuff/Temp%20for%20predictions/43-June16thThere%27llBeNobodyLeft---.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

purplespacefriend <fsumption@...>
